channel.title: Hi
channel.description: im stuck i go to play this game and it comes up error connecting to server press cancel then start server to make your own it also comes up server ip 127.0.0.1 then i went round servers trying to logg in i press play on the and it comes up error connecting to server press cancel then start server to make your own i press start server and it comes up server ip 127.0.0.1 i dont get it please help :confused:

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Oh em gee
I can not believe you are serious
Please go to www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
and use an IP from there to play on other servers

If you want to make your own server use dis guide plawks

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

My god your very hopeless, first of all you need to download a source and run “runserver.bat” then go to ip : 127.0.0.1 even then you need to portforward for other people to play and u need ip Duc - please go to tutorial section and look at how to make a servr =(
